description: This file defines a React component named DashboardPage that displays a list of unassigned service requests. It includes functions for rendering request data, manages state for requests and errors, and handles user interactions such as accepting requests. It references external services for data fetching and status utility functions to display request status badges.

methods.name: statusBadge(status)
methods.description: Returns a span element with a className and label based on the request status.

methods.name: renderVehicleCell(vehicle)
methods.description: Constructs a string label for a vehicle combining make and model.

methods.name: DashboardPage({ user })
methods.description: React functional component that displays available unassigned requests and allows mechanics to accept them.

ctags.name: [ { key: "id", header: "Request", render: (r) => <Link className="link" to={`/requests/${r.id}`}>{r.id.slice(0, 8)}</ { key: "createdAt", header: "Created", render: (r) => new Date(r.createdAt).toLocaleString() }, { key: "vehicle", header: "Vehicle", render: (r) => renderVehicleCell(r.vehicle), }, { key: "status", header: "Status", render: (r) => statusBadge(r.status) }, { key: "action", header: "Action", render: (r) => ( <Button size="sm" onClick={() => accept(r.id)} disabled={busyId === r.id}> {busyId === r.id ? "Accepting..." : "Accept"} </ ), }, ]
